Package com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.dragon.loot

Class DragonLootTable

java.lang.Object
com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.dragon.loot.DragonLootTable
public class DragonLootTable
extends Object
Represents a dragon's loot table. These tables are used to randomly generate unique loot for every dragon while being reusable for multiple dragons.
Author:
Parker Hawke - Choco

  • Field Details

    • LOOT_TABLES_FOLDER

      public static final File LOOT_TABLES_FOLDER

  • Constructor Details

    • DragonLootTable

      public DragonLootTable​(String id, DragonLootElementEgg egg, List<ILootPool<DragonLootElementCommand>> commandPools, List<ILootPool<DragonLootElementItem>> chestPools)
      Create a DragonLootTable.
      Parameters:
      id - the loot table's unique id
      egg - the egg element. If null, no egg will be generated
      commandPools - the command loot pools
      chestPools - the chest loot pools
      See Also:
      ILootPool, fromJsonFile(File)

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Get this loot table's unique id.
      Returns:
      the loot table id

    • getChestChance

      public double getChestChance()
      Get the chance (0.0 - 100.0) that a chest will be generated and item loot pools will be rolled.
      Returns:
      the chest chance

    • getChestName

      public String getChestName()
      Get the custom name of the generated chest.
      Returns:
      the chest's name

    • getEgg

      public DragonLootElementEgg getEgg()
      Get the egg loot element.
      Returns:
      the egg element

    • getCommandPools

      public List<ILootPool<DragonLootElementCommand>> getCommandPools()
      Get an immutable list of the command loot pools.
      Returns:
      an immutable command pool list

    • getChestPools

      public List<ILootPool<DragonLootElementItem>> getChestPools()
      Get an immutable list of the chest loot pools.
      Returns:
      an immutable chest pool list

    • generate

      public void generate​(org.bukkit.boss.DragonBattle battle, org.bukkit.entity.EnderDragon dragon)
      Generate loot for the given DragonBattle and EnderDragon. All loot pools will be rolled and generated. The egg will be generated first (and put in a chest if necessary), then the chest item pools, followed by the command pools.
      Parameters:
      battle - the battle for which to generate loot
      dragon - the dragon for which to generate loot

    • asJson

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject asJson()
      Write this loot table as a JsonObject.
      Returns:
      the JSON representation

    • fromJsonFile

      public static DragonLootTable fromJsonFile​(File file) throws com.google.gson.JsonParseException
      Parse a DragonLootTable instance from a JSON file. The file extension from the specified file is validated. If the file is not terminated by .json, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
      Parameters:
      file - the file from which to parse the loot table
      Returns:
      the parsed loot table
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file is invalid
      com.google.gson.JsonParseException - if the parsing at all fails

    • loadLootTables

      public static List<DragonLootTable> loadLootTables()
      Load and parse all DragonLootTable objects from the dragons folder.
      Returns:
      all parsed DragonLootTable objects
